home.name: Cristhian M. Cespedes
home.presentation: I am a systems engineer focused on the design and construction of web applications that generate exceptional digital experiences, I am currently expanding my knowledge in backend development with .NET core.

about.subtitle: About me
about.p1: Hello, I am Cristhian Mercado Cespedes, a systems engineer residing in Bolivia, specialized in web development, since 2018 during my career I was lucky enough to learn about web technologies and until now I have dedicated myself to learning and polishing my programming skills.
about.p2: Learning HTML CSS and Javascript on my own opened the way to Frontend frameworks and later Backend. Design was my main motivation and along the way I learned about UI/UX design..
about.p3: I am currently looking for a job, and consolidating my knowledge of backend with .NET core framework.

portfolio.subtitle: Projects
portfolio.text: Projects, practices and collaborations that I carried out.

projects.title: Dactilosaurio
projects.description: Application to practice typing online with friends, inspired by the well-known Velocidactil app.

projects.title: Quotation system
projects.description: Web quotation system to support the UMSS financial administration department.

projects.title: Restaurant app
projects.description: API REST consumption practice in a food product management system and its delivery for a restaurant.

projects.title: AI facial recognition
projects.description: Practice of a web app to perform online exams with facial recognition based on a multi-agent system.

projects.title: SAMBA Service Manager
projects.description: Practice of an application to manage the SAMBA service for the Linux distribution OpenSuse 15.1

contact.subtitle: Contact
contact.p: I am currently looking for a job, I leave my data here for any query, job offer, collaboration or just to say hello. I am always aware of my mail.
